properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Perry, AL; Dallas, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 8:24PM CST until February 13 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River At Centreville Affecting Bibb...Dallas and Perry
Counties.
Cahaba River At Marion Junction Affecting Dallas and Perry
Counties.

.A Flood Warning has been issued along the Cahaba River at Centreville
and Marion Junction due to expected rainfall between 2 and 4 inches
through Tuesday. Heavier rainfall is forecast along upstream portions
of the river. Additional rainfall is likely mid to late week which
will cause water levels to remain elevated or rise further. Interests
should closely monitor the latest river forecasts through the upcoming
week.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River At Centreville.
* from Tuesday afternoon to Thursday afternoon...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 7:15 PM Sunday The stage Was 8.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 23 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by early Tuesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 28.1 feet by Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 30 feet...Considerable flooding of farm and pasture
lands in the area occurs...and cattle may need to be moved to
higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
